content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 20, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 24}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 4, "index": 25}, {"type": "shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 3, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft diorite, I need to smelt the nether_quartz_ore at slot 25 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 25 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft diorite, I need to place 1 cobblestone and 1 quartz in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the cobblestone from slot 24 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 20, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 24}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 3, "index": 40}]

thought: Since the cobblestone has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the quartz to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the quartz to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
